replies.body: I came When Oc.tc was shutting down, and I went to find a server related to this one... I saw Avicus in the chat, and i went here!

reply_to.body: What brought you to Avicus/How did you first arrive here?
reply_to.body_tagged: What brought you to Avicus/How did you first arrive here?

replies.body:
Imo ur a nice person, and ur good at map making.

Lets See... Um ur name, when I try to type it, I always spell it wrong since I only type 4 Y's, not 5 D;... So change ur name:D

I like the avicus community, I also like the mix gamemode.

I think we need more players, also we need more maps in the rot
